summary: Comprehensive testing of Curriculum Planner feature and Contact Form. All backend APIs (30/30 tests) passed. Frontend Curriculum Planner CRUD operations working: Create, View (timeline modal), Edit, Delete with confirmation. Contact form successfully saves to database and shows success message.
seed_data_creation: Created test curriculum 'TEST Spring Bible Study 2026' and contact form submissions
context_for_next_testing_agent: Curriculum Planner fully tested - Create/Read/Update/Delete all working. Contact form tested and saves to MongoDB. Test user has 8 lessons and 2 curriculum plans.

backend_apis: GET /api/curriculum - Returns user's curriculum plans (auth required)
POST /api/curriculum - Creates new curriculum plan (auth required)
DELETE /api/curriculum/{id} - Deletes plan with confirmation (auth required)
POST /api/contact - Saves contact submission to database and sends email notification
frontend_features: Unauthenticated users see 'Sign in to access Curriculum Planner' prompt
Authenticated users see their curriculum plans with stats (Total Plans, Active, Upcoming, Total Lessons)
New Curriculum button opens create modal with form fields (title, description, start date, end date, age group)
Lesson selection available in curriculum modal with search and reorder functionality
Curriculum cards display: status badge (Active/Upcoming/Completed), title, description, age group, lesson count, date range
View Full Curriculum modal shows timeline view with lesson details and dates
Edit button opens edit modal with pre-filled data and 'Update Curriculum' button
Delete button shows browser confirmation dialog and removes plan
Contact form at /contact with fields: Name, Email, Inquiry Type, Subject, Message
Contact form shows 'Message Sent Successfully!' after submission

curriculum_crud.create: Verified - Created 'TEST Spring Bible Study 2026' curriculum with dates Mar 1 - May 31, 2026
curriculum_crud.read: Verified - Curriculum cards display correct info, View Full Curriculum modal works
curriculum_crud.update: Verified - Edit modal opens with existing data, Update Curriculum button present
curriculum_crud.delete: Verified - Confirmation dialog works, curriculum removed from list

contact_form.submission: Verified - Form submits successfully via POST /api/contact
contact_form.database: Verified - 3 contact submissions found in MongoDB contact_submissions collection
contact_form.success_message: Verified - Shows 'Message Sent Successfully!' with 'We'll respond within 24-48 hours'
